item.title: Contact
item.description: Member Yusuke Aoki Ryohei Banno Takeshi Kaneko Ryunosuke Nagayama Kai Otsuki Kazuyuki Shudo Laboratory website Distributed Systems Group (Shudo Lab.) Contact E-mail: dsg-titech at googlegroups.com

item.title: Publications
item.description: Ryunosuke Nagayama, Kazuyuki Shudo, “Simulating Ethereum Network with SimBlock”, lightning talks, Devcon 5 (by Ethereum Foundation), October 2019. Kai Otsuki, Ryohei Banno, Kazuyuki Shudo, “Effects of a Simple Relay Network on the Bitcoin Network”, in Proc. Asian Internet Engineering Conference (AINTEC), August 2019. Ryohei Banno, Kazuyuki Shudo, “Simulating a Blockchain Network with SimBlock”, in Proc. IEEE International Conference on Blockchain and Cryptocurrency (ICBC), May 2019. Yusuke Aoki, Kai Otsuki, Takeshi Kaneko, Ryohei Banno, Kazuyuki Shudo, “SimBlock: A Blockchain Network Simulator”, in Proc.
